name: Dragon Ball Z: Supersonic Warriors
description: The Dragon Ball Z: Supersonic Warriors (ドラゴンボールZ 舞空闘劇, Doragon Bōru Zetto Bukū Tôgeki) is a series of fighting games based on the Dragon Ball franchise. The first game, Dragon Ball Z Supersonic Warriors was developed by Arc System Works and Cavia and was released for the Game Boy Advance on June 22, 2004. The game was followed by the 2005 sequel, Dragon Ball Z: Supersonic Warriors 2 for the Nintendo DS.
